summary: Not to be a downer but I think Dil will probably die at the end of Dilmas and that'll be the end of the sims
question: Not to be a downer but I think Dil will probably die at the end of Dilmas and that'll be the end of the sims
answer: If they’re planning on ending the gaming channel, I think you could be right. But if not, I can still see Dil dying, but I think dnp will carry on with Dab and Evan. You know. Because.

summary: I think there's a really good chance they're ending the gaming channel. Either that or they want to make big changes to it next...
question: I think there's a really good chance they're ending the gaming channel. Either that or they want to make big changes to it next year. Why else would they be in such a hurry to end all of these series.
answer: I’m not putting on my conspiracy hat right away. The dvp board was getting outrageously full, so their option there were end it, or start over. And they literally just ran out of levels to play in golf. So both of those series at least make sense to end at this particular point in time.

reblog.comment: I’m not putting on my conspiracy hat right away. The dvp board was getting outrageously full, so their option there were end it, or start over. And they literally just ran out of levels to play in golf. So both of those series at least make sense to end at this particular point in time.

And they literally just ran out of levels to play in golf. So both of those series at least make sense to end at this particular point in time.

And they literally just ran out of levels to play in golf. So both of those series at least make sense to end at this particular point in time.

blog.name: cactuslester
blog.title: You're Next To Me In My Life
blog.description:
Jess|18|US|she/her
admin for the Dil Howlter Defense Squad
  fic author & beta
fic link for mobile
prompts: open

summary: i see like a lot of people freaking out about how this probably means the end of dan and phil and they’re planning to leave...
body:
i see like a lot of people freaking out about how this probably means the end of dan and phil and they’re planning to leave youtube soon, and while that’s possible, i personally don’t think so.

like i know they’ve ended a lot of series recently (dan vs phil, golf with friends, aging up dil & tabitha), and some people feel like this pinof was the last because of all the references to pinof 1, and of course the end of ii was the end of an era. 

but honestly i think of a lot of the “ends” just coincidentally happened at the same time. like dvp, they really were running out of space on the board wouldn’t have made it through another year of dvp without needing to get another board, so the end of this year is a nice time to end the series. there are only 7 levels of golf with friends currently out, and they’ve finished all the levels so it makes sense that the series has ended. (i personally think if new levels come out they might continue the series if there’s high enough demand.) i think aging up dil and tabs is the only real major choice they’ve made recently on the gaming channel that has weight because that was fully a choice dnp made and not influenced by things like the board running out of room or running out of golf levels. but even then, it’s not like they could’ve kept dil and tabs the same age forever. i don’t think they’re gonna end the sims series soon, I think they might just start focusing more on dab and evan. 

as for pinof, i know the references and the fact that it was the 10th pinof made it seem really final from a certain point of view, but i think it’s still highly possible there will be many more to come. 2018 was a really big year of personal growth for dnp, and they’ve definitely gotten a lot more comfortable with who they are, and i think this allowed them to reference 2009 a bit more openly because they knew the phandom wanted it and they were comfortable enough to do so. and 10 is a big round number and a lot of the pinofs are iconic, i think even without the references, there would’ve been theories that this is the last pinof simply bc 10 is a round number that we arbitrarily assign significance to and the phandom is generally quite dramatic anyways.

and yes ii was the end of an era and it’s their last world tour, but it had to end at some point. ii was fun for them and us, but we all know that it took a huge toll on them physically and emotionally simply because a world tour is a lot of work. so it makes sense that they wouldn’t want to keep doing world tours for as long as they do youtube.

finally, a worry has been that dan is leaving youtube because he hasn’t been posting on his channel, but he addressed that in the tumblr q&a. he said nothing much is changing and that he’s not going anywhere any time soon, and I believe him because dnp, as far as youtubers go, are really quite honest with their audience.

and of course, there’s still a chance im wrong, but i do strongly believe that they’re not planning on leaving youtube soon. feel free to respond with your opinions, similar or opposing! i’m always down to talk about some theories

blog.description: This blog is a little bit of everything. Fandoms, recipes, indie music, boho outfits, cute animals, inspiratnol quotes. If you're a person you'll probably find something you like on here.

summary: I so sincerely believe that this is how filming of gaming videos has always been (ie distracting each other with that hand slap...
body: I so sincerely believe that this is how filming of gaming videos has always been (ie distracting each other with that hand slap game) but they would just edit it out. I’m so, so happy they are so comfortable being themselves on camera. Not that they haven’t always been themselves, but recently they are so authentic it’s almost sickening (in the best way possible). I’ve been watching dip and pip since 2011 (I’m old, I know) and this is honestly the happiest I’ve ever seen them be on camera. Am I sad that dan vs Phil is ending? Yeah. Am I excited to see what they do next? Hell yeah, no matter how small or big that next thing is.

summary: Dan getting down on one knee and saying "Philip Michael Lester" while preparing to put a crown on him is the closest we'll ever...
body: Dan getting down on one knee and saying “Philip Michael Lester” while preparing to put a crown on him is the closest we’ll ever get to a proposal video. I’m going to hell for this but I can’t help that that’s the first thought that popped into my head when I watched that part I’m sorry.
